title: API Gateway to querying DynamoDB via Lambda
description: Demonstrate querying DyanmoDB from an API Gateway path parameter via a Lambda coded in Rust

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to query DynamoDB via a composite key with the AWS Rust SDK.
The query is triggered via an API Gateway GET request that is handled by a Lambda.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Benjamen Pyle
